title: Reflections
description: Mark Miller (One, Small World Global Protection Agency) teams with his daughter and first time author Olivia Miller.In Sons of the King, they have created a Christian-influenced fantasy world with a touch of science fiction. In the land of Mysstira on the planet Kaskaya, a great King has three sons. When a mysterious visitor falls from the sky, their world is changed forever. The sons of the King will soon face their destiny.Episode Five sees Dig, now known as Ekron Bow, and his friends leaving the Thieves’ Village in an attempt to return to the Dome. He wants to save his brother and heal the land of Mysstira. Before he gets there, the group must pass through the Forest of Deception. Also, Dig’s friend and former Domo, Kendul Grimes continues his search to uncover Esephis’s secrets.
author: Mark  Miller
